name: XpressAccounts Data File
summary: Learn about .PXA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The data stored in PXA files can be used for generating financial reports in the software, including balance sheets, dashboard summaries, and transaction reports.

description: File created by XpressAccounts, an accounting application for small and medium sized businesses and organizations; contains company profile information and financial records; used for saving and backing up business accounting data.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .pxa file in Furnace Creek Software Pixen 5
images.caption: PXA file open in Furnace Creek Software Pixen 5
